code:
-spec min_operations(Nums :: [integer()], Target :: integer()) -> integer().
min_operations(Nums, Target) ->
    Sorted = lists:sort(Nums),
    {Result, _} = lists:foldl(fun(X, {Acc, T}) ->
                                  if
                                      T >= X ->
                                          {Acc, T - X};
                                      X > 1 ->
                                          {Acc + 1, T + X div 2};
                                      true ->
                                          {Acc, T}
                                  end
                              end, {0, Target}, Sorted),
    if
        Result > 0 andalso Target == 0 ->
            Result - 1;  % Subtract one because the last operation is not needed
        Target == 0 ->
            0;
        true ->
            -1
    end.
